Title: Authorizes patients to designate an essential visitor who may assist the patient and perform certain duties on behalf of the patient
Summary: Authorizes patients to designate an essential visitor who may assist the patient and perform certain duties on behalf of the patient, including communicating with facility staff regarding the needs of the patient, providing emotional stability and company, and requesting additional care or a change in the care plan.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to authorizing patients to designate an essential visitor who may assist the patient and perform certain duties on behalf of the patient
